description:
Located in Louisville, Kentucky, the Justice Law Office provides unmatched representation to those who suffered a debilitating injury or devastating loss on the job or from a serious accident caused by someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

Serving clients throughout the Louisville metro area and across the state, attorney Scott C. Justice has an extensive amount of experience fighting for the rights and entitlements of plaintiff injury clients and their families. He established our law firm with a mission to deliver the highest level of advocacy and support possible for their personal injury and workers' compensation claims.

A native of Kentucky, attorney Justice has a genuine concern for the legal issues that affect the residents of our community, and he has gained a reputation for his in-depth legal knowledge, effective trial skills and aggressive representation designed to increase our clients' chances for success. Honored for his professionalism and service, he has earned a Top 40 Under 40 designation from the National Trial Lawyers as well as many other consistent top rankings and endorsements from his peers.

As proud as we are of our accolades, our true measure of success comes from how we treat our clients, and we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for those we have served. While we can make no guarantees regarding your case, we can promise to do all we can to improve the likelihood you will obtain the full amount of compensation you need and the justice you deserve.

To find out more, you can contact the Justice Law Office by phone or through our law firm's website to set up a free case evaluation. We also offer virtual consultations to help keep you and your loved ones safe in today's uncertain environment.
